description:
With JupyterHub you can create a multi-user Hub which spawns, manages,
and proxies multiple instances of the single-user Jupyter notebook
(IPython notebook) server.

JupyterHub provides single-user notebook servers to many users. For
example, JupyterHub could serve notebooks to a class of students, a
corporate workgroup, or a science research group.
title: JupyterHub: A "things explainer overview"
